snippet: The credit card and payments processor is pursuing what will be one of the biggest stock market debuts this year.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: DealBook Online; First Data Corp says it will attempt to raise up to $3.2 billion when it goes public.
lead_paragraph: The credit card and payments processor is pursuing what will be one of the biggest stock market debuts this year.

headline.main: First Data Seeks to Raise $3.2 Billion in I.P.O.
